page.title: 16Employment outside Fairford
page.content: Here is a list of ocupations of over half of the fathers of children at the local Primary School. They all work outside Fairford. ( for inside Fairford see Page 15 ). Builder 9, Computer Operator 6, Engineer 6, Farmer 6, R.A.F. Pilot 5, Engineering 4, Manager 4, Welder 3, Electrician 3, Driver 3, Teacher 2, Publican 2, Executive 2, Foreman 2. Only one father worked as the following: Policeman, Coalman, Butcher, Scientist, Shepherd, Fitter, Estate Agent, Double Glazier, Cartographer, Surveyor, Millwright, Chef, Insurance Officer, Technician. Mothers were employed as follows: Teacher 6, Shop Assistant 3, Farmer 3, Office Worker 3, Secretary 2, Nurse 2, Youth Worker 2, Cleaner 2, Clerk 2.
